org.openbel.framework.core.df.beldata
Class BELDataHeaderParser

java.lang.Object
  org.openbel.framework.core.df.beldata.BELDataHeaderParser
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnnotationHeaderParser, NamespaceHeaderParser
public abstract class BELDataHeaderParser
extends Object

BELDataHeaderParser represents a BEL data document parser for the header section. This parser understands header blocks and block properties like 

    [SomeValue]
    PropertyKey1=PropertyValue1
    PropertyKey2=PropertyValue2
Block header values, property key, and property values are all trimmed of leading/trailing whitespace using String.trim(). Additionally, lines that are blank or start with the comment character '#' are ignored.

Author:
Anthony Bargnesi <abargnesi@selventa.com>

getNextCharacterOffset

public long getNextCharacterOffset()
Retrieves the next character offset of the file parsed.

Returns:
long, the character stop offset, some positive number indicating the offset of the next character to read, which could be -1 if the file was fully read

parse

public Map<String,Properties> parse(File belDataFile)
                             throws IOException
Parse the BEL Data header File to a Map of block name to block properties held in a Properties object.

Parameters:
belDataFile - File, the BEL data document file to parse
Returns:
Map of String to Properties the properties indexed in a block name
Throws:
IOException, - if there was an error reading from belDataFile
IOException
